title: Get the most out of your PC by upgrading to Windows 11 Pro, now under $25 before Black Friday!
content:
Macworld

No matter how bright, shiny, and powerful the exterior package is, the beating heart of your machine is what truly defines its performance. You can make sure your PC is hitting its peak abilities by upgrading to Microsoft’s top-rated operating system, now only $24.97 (reg. $199) through November 16th. This could be a great gift to a loved one this holiday season!

With Windows 11 Pro (which can be installed on up to 3 devices!), you’ll get a boatload of enhanced security features, including:

  • Enjoy biometrics login
  • TPM 2.0
  • Smart App Control
  • Windows Studio Effects
  • Encrypted authentication and advanced antivirus measures
  • Microsoft Information Protection

There are also plenty of business and professional-focused features, such as:

  • Azure AD
  • Hyper-V
  • Windows Sandbox
  • BitLocker device encryption
  • And much more!

Gamers can even benefit from Windows 11 Pro, as it comes with DirectX 12 Ultimate, which can boost hardware and allow them to play the latest and greatest games in stunning clarity. Plus, remote workers can enjoy remote desktop access and virtualization technology.

Just be sure the device (PC only) you want to upgrade is compatible with Windows 11 and meets all the necessary system requirements before purchasing.

Give yourself or a loved one the gift of advanced security, productivity, and more.

Get a lifetime license to Windows 11 Pro at the incredibly holiday-friendly price of just $24.97 through November 16th at 11:59pm PT. No coupon required!
